title: Attack on Titan
summary: In a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction due to giant humanoid creatures called Titans, a young man vows to exterminate them after his hometown is destroyed.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
summary: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone after an alchemical ritual goes wrong and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

title: Death Note
summary: A high school student discovers a notebook with the power to kill anyone whose name he writes in it, leading to a battle of wits with a brilliant detective.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
summary: A young boy becomes a demon slayer to save his sister and avenge his family after a demon attack.

title: Naruto: Shippuden
summary: The story of Naruto Uzumaki continues as he matures and seeks to become the strongest ninja in the world while battling threats to his village.

title: One Piece
summary: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew set sail to find the legendary treasure, One Piece, and become the Pirate King.

title: Hunter x Hunter
summary: A young boy embarks on a journey to become a Hunter and find his father, encountering incredible challenges along the way.

title: My Hero Academia
summary: In a world where almost everyone has superpowers, a young boy born without them dreams of becoming a hero.

title: Sword Art Online
summary: Players are trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG where death in the game means death in real life.

title: Your Name
summary: Two teenagers mysteriously swap bodies and must figure out how to navigate each other's lives while uncovering a deeper connection.
